channel.title: 迪米特法则 on Sanoon
channel.description: Recent content in 迪米特法则 on Sanoon

item.title: SOLID 原则
item.description: 六大原则 设计模式有六大原则，分别是： 单一职责：Single Responsibility Principle 开闭原则：Open Closed Principle 里氏替换：Liskov Substitution Principle 迪米特法则：Law of Demeter 接口隔离：Interface Segregation Principle 依赖倒置：Dependence Inversion Principle 它
